programme.title: Disparus à tout jamais

programme.desc: Une rédactrice de mode entreprend une croisière entre Londres et New York; malheureusement, elle ne se rendra jamais à destination; on se demande qui l'a tuée et si quelqu'un à bord sait ce qui s'est passé.

programme.title: CSI: New York
programme.desc: Une flèche tue une mannequin et blesse un milliardaire à une fête.

programme.title: La faille
programme.desc: Nathan connaît bien Sylvie et la famille Prévost; peut-être qu'ils seraient ligués dans la vengeance.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc: Murdoch, Brackenreid, Crabtree, Watts et Higgins participent à la parade de Noël; avant le début des festivités, un corps émerge du sac de cadeaux du père Noël; dans la bouche de la victime se trouvent des billets avec le mot VILAIN.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc: Murdoch enquête sur l'assassinat du propriétaire d'une entreprise de construction; entre-temps, Effie, une jambe cassée, se met à épier ses voisins; elle s'imagine le pire lorsque les McDowell enterrent quelque chose dans leur cour en pleine nuit.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc: Murdoch et Brackenreid se rendent aux Jeux des Highlands; leur participation aux épreuves de force devra toutefois attendre puisqu'un meurtre vient d'être commis; au bord d'une rivière, Ogden et Margaret découvrent un cadavre dans les roseaux.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc: Un corps est retrouvé dans une ruelle avec la carte de tarot de la mort; Murdoch est convaincu qu'il y a un lien entre la foire de voyance qui bat son plein et le révérend Kitteridge qui, furieux, dénonce ces supposés adorateurs du diable.

programme.title: Le goût du crime
programme.desc: Un nounou populaire est retrouvé mort dans une banlieue cossue; en enquêtant, Alexa découvre que certains parents peuvent être plus terrifiants que la plupart des tueurs qu'elle a déjà rencontrés.

programme.title: HPI: haut potentiel intellectuel
programme.desc: Karadec mène sa dernière enquête avant de rejoindre la brigade financière; Morgane a peu de temps pour enfin lui annoncer qu'elle est enceinte.

programme.title: CSI: New York
programme.desc: Mac, Stella et Flack enquêtent sur un jeu que mène à la mort d'un homme.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Plusieurs femmes riches se font dévaliser alors qu'elles se trouvaient dans un spa luxueux.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.desc: Goodwin est contrainte de suivre les ordres et de procéder à de douloureuses mises à pied; la fille de Charles est hospitalisée à la suite d'un grave accident de voiture; un patient en attente d'une greffe prend une décision qui va changer sa vie.

programme.title: Rosewood
programme.desc: Rosewood enquête sur la mort suspecte d'un homme souffrant de problèmes médicaux comparables aux siens, ce qui l'oblige à regarder la réalité en face et à accepter le fait qu'il pourrait bien mourir.

programme.title: Rosewood
programme.desc: Rosewood et Villa enquêtent sur le meurtre d'une vedette de télénovela et ont l'impression de voir leur propre relation alors qu'ils explorent un monde où les intrigues se vivent aussi bien devant la caméra qu'en coulisses.

programme.title: Rosewood
programme.desc: Quand deux corps et des liasses de billets s'échouent sur une plage de Miami Beach, Rosewood et Villa se retrouvent obligés de travailler avec un médecin légiste rival qui compromet le contrat de Rosewood avec la police de Miami Est.

programme.title: Esprits criminels
programme.desc: L'équipe doit trouver l'auteur d'un attentat au gaz sarin dans un autobus de Los Angeles.

programme.title: Esprits criminels
programme.desc: À Savannah, de futures mariées sont assassinées la veille de leur mariage; le BAU se rend sur place et essaie de comprendre ce qui motive la jalousie maladive de l'assassin.

programme.title: Esprits criminels
programme.desc: Trois employés d'un restaurant de Las Vegas sont tués lors d'un vol, amenant l'équipe à rouvrir une affaire semblable survenue six ans plus tôt qui n'a jamais été résolue.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Une célèbre mannequin, coqueluche des médias, est retrouvée électrocutée dans son bain au cours d'une fête.

programme.title: Au banc des accusés
programme.desc: Une mère divorcée est accusée d'avoir tué son ex-mari violent; après s'être introduite par effraction chez lui pour récupérer un bien, elle l'avait trouvé mort électrocuté au sol; au lieu d'appeler les secours, elle avait simplement quitté les lieux.

programme.title: Unité des personnes disparues
programme.desc: Une équipe féminine d'aviron disparaît lors d'un entraînement matinal; Kemi trouve des preuves reliant l'une des filles au parrain de la mafia irlandaise; Jason et Mike interrogent un mafieux polonais rival qui pourrait avoir des informations.

programme.title: Happy Face
programme.desc: Melissa et Ivy trouvent des images inconnues de Heather qui changent tout; Elijah a sa journée au tribunal; Ben reçoit de mauvaises nouvelles au travail et de pires nouvelles à la maison; le secret de Joyce est révélé.

programme.title: Esprits criminels
programme.desc: Le BAU est appelé sur une affaire déconcertante: plusieurs personnes impliquées dans des oeuvres de charité sont retrouvées mortes en pleine nature, marquées d'un dessin cryptique.

programme.title: Esprits criminels
programme.desc: Des torses d'hommes sont retrouvés abandonnés dans les rues de Palm Springs; l'identification des victimes est difficile, mais le profil du tueur se dessine quand il commence à frapper la communauté gaie.

programme.title: Croisière vers la mort
programme.desc: Un père et sa fille font une croisière en haute mer; lorsqu'un soir, le père disparaît, la famille se demande ce qui a bien pu arriver au pilier de la famille.

programme.desc: Pour son baptême sur la terrible route de Webequie, Martin récolte la totale : il se prend dans une côte et brise sa courroie d'alternateur; Pier-Alexandre et Daniel planifient un gigantesque garage en toile pour pouvoir réparer les camions à l'abri.

programme.title: Fermont
programme.desc: Patrick, chargé de l'entretien des chemins du Mont-Wright, doit se tailler une place pour circuler parmi les immenses camions sur la mine, aux commandes de sa niveleuse. Au garage, les mécaniciens Pascal et Maxime affrontent plusieurs défis.

programme.title: Catastrophes naturelles: survivre au pire
programme.desc: Une série de tornades frappe le Texas et le Kansas. Des témoins filment la destruction et partagent leurs récits de survie et de résilience.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: Une série de décisions controversées provoque la chute d'un turbopropulseur norvégien.

programme.title: Caméras à bord

programme.title: Cauchemar sur l'autoroute
programme.desc: Un conducteur de camion survit à un accident pendant une tempête de neige; gênés par la neige abondante, les rochers et le froid extrême, Colin et Kelly finissent le difficile remorquage en respectant un délai serré.

programme.title: Cauchemar sur l'autoroute
programme.desc: Une trop grosse charge met à l'épreuve Jamie et sa remorqueuse reconstruite HR-126; un transporteur de gravier frappe une paroi rocheuse, laissant un fouillis pour Kelly et John; l'assistant Gord Lundin a une chance d'exploiter sa propre dépanneuse.

programme.title: Cauchemar sur l'autoroute
programme.desc: Jamie et sa flotte de remorqueuses sont coincés dans leur propre cour par une chute de neige importante; un remorquage dans une profonde neige poudreuse provoque de gros ennuis pour Colin; Al et Gord sauvent un semi-remorque d'une position fragile.

programme.title: Cauchemar sur l'autoroute
programme.desc: Le fils de Jamie, âgé de 13 ans, reçoit une leçon de remorquage lorsqu'une semi-remorque s'écrase sur un remblai de 150 pieds; des glissements de terrain au nord de Hope provoquent la fermeture de routes et un nettoyage explosif.

programme.title: Cauchemar sur l'autoroute
programme.desc: Jamie conduit le Python hors de la route pour la première fois tandis que son frère Kelly affronte des vents violents et un poteau électrique pour sauver un semi-remorque chargé de tuyaux.

programme.title: Étrange évidence
programme.desc: En Asie centrale, des personnes endeuillées entrent dans le cimetière de leur village pour n'y trouver que des rangées de trous vides.

programme.title: Les hot rods de Shorty

programme.title: La guerre des enchères
programme.desc: Les filles préparent une surprise pour Emily sur le thème des nouveaux mariés; Rene fait des trouvailles dans un grand entrepôt, et Darrell réalise que ses connaissances en matière de vélo sont encore bonnes.

programme.title: La guerre des enchères
programme.desc: Les plus vieilles installations de Los Angeles sont idéales pour initier les nouveaux acheteurs; Brandi et Jarrod tentent de se frayer un chemin jusqu'à la victoire, et Ivy réussit à obtenir la plupart des unités.

programme.title: La guerre des enchères
programme.desc: Les acheteurs débarquent dans la ville natale de Dan; l'achat de Kenny vide son portefeuille, et Brandi et Jarrod risquent leur budget de vacances.

programme.title: La guerre des enchères

programme.desc: À Barrie, dernier arrêt de la tournée en aréna, l'enjeu est de taille : un duel père-fils oppose Michael Vaters Sr à son fils en finale. Pendant ce temps, l'équipe de BMX se prépare pour le Cirque Extrême Canadien.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: En route vers Dallas au départ d'Orlando, un Learjet privé transportant la légende du golf Payne Stewart montre un comportement délinquant; les contrôleurs aériens sont incapables de joindre l'équipage.

programme.title: Les hot rods de Shorty

programme.desc: Harvey se prévaut d'une vieille dette pour le compte du cabinet; Mike se mesure à un adversaire improbable; Louis en vient à accepter son nouveau rôle.

programme.title: Étrange évidence

programme.title: Alaska: la ruée vers l'or

programme.title: Cauchemar sur l'autoroute
programme.desc: Jamie traverse l'Amérique du Nord pour retracer l'histoire du remorquage; il s'intéresse à l'invention de la première remorqueuse et aux innovations récentes dans le domaine pour comprendre comment ces véhicules ont façonné le monde moderne.

programme.title: Mayday

programme.title: Chercheurs d'opale

programme.title: Alaska: la ruée vers l'or

programme.title: Armageddon: pourrons-nous échapper à notre apocalypse?
programme.desc: Il y a 66 millions d'années, une météorite a provoqué l'extinction des dinosaures. Aujourd'hui, 25 000 astéroïdes menacent la Terre. Les agences spatiales développent des stratégies pour éviter une nouvelle catastrophe.

programme.title: Alaska: la ruée vers l'or

programme.title: Alaska: la ruée vers l'or

programme.title: Alaska: la ruée vers l'or

programme.desc: Les connectés tentent de découvrir qui leur a donné une moins bonne note la veille; le défi fait vivre toutes sortes d'émotions aux couples; alors que certains jouent le tout pour le tout, d'autres ne sont pas capable de compléter le défi.

programme.title: Le grand chantier RONA
programme.desc: Les équipes se dépêchent de terminer les travaux avant la remise du troisième marteau d'or et l'annonce de l'élimination de la semaine.

programme.title: Un souper presque parfait
programme.desc: Antoine prépare des recettes libanaises tout en nous racontant comment il concilie ses passions pour la moto et la charité; on joue à un jeu de devinettes sur des maisons à vendre, on parle des courtiers qui nuisent à la réputation de la profession.

programme.title: Trois fois plus
programme.desc: La famille Lacombe emmène les triplets chez le barbier pour la première fois et craint le pire, mais une belle surprise l'attend.

programme.title: De taudis à logis
programme.desc: Duke est de retour, prêt à rénover d'autres maisons avec vos experts, Keith et Alynne.

programme.title: Vendre ou rénover? USA
programme.desc: Maintenant que leurs garçons sont plus âgés, Mona et Dong sont prêts à transformer leur maison vieillissante en un endroit de rêve.

programme.title: Karine et la maison jaune
programme.desc: Karine reçoit sa porte d'entrée et ses armoires de cuisine, tandis que la céramique rose de la salle de bain lui cause quelques soucis; elle s'inquiète aussi de la taille de son divan conçu sur mesure, qui semble trop gros pour le salon.

programme.title: Luxe au bord du lac
programme.desc: Alain et Sara, agriculteurs écoresponsables, cherchent une maison au bord d'un lac adaptée à leur mode de vie écologique.

programme.title: Vendre ou rénover au Québec
programme.desc: Véronique et Marc-Alexandre ont d'abord deux enfants dans une maison qui devient rapidement trop petite. En 2014, ils achètent un bungalow plus spacieux à Sainte-Catherine.

programme.title: Joyeux désordre
programme.desc: Une cliente attachée émotionnellement à ses objets apprend à garder l'essentiel sans perdre ses souvenirs.

programme.title: Hollywood rénove avec les frères Scott
programme.desc: Mira sollicite les frères Scott pour rénover la maison d'une amie proche après des problèmes de plomberie.

programme.title: Chirurgie de l'extrême
programme.desc: Tamika a trouvé un partenaire avec lequel elle est heureuse, mais elle se sent mal à l'aise à cause de son surplus de peau.

programme.title: Chirurgie de l'extrême
programme.desc: Maranda a perdu le poids qu'elle avait pris en raison d'un crime horrible, mais sa peau lui rappelle son traumatisme.

programme.title: Chirurgie de l'extrême
programme.desc: Rafael a perdu plus de 500 livres, mais son excédent de peau est aujourd'hui un obstacle majeur dans sa vie.

programme.title: SOS dermato
programme.desc: Leanne craint de subir une opération chirurgicale malgré son désir de se débarrasser d'un énorme lipome qui se trouve dans son dos.

programme.title: Cinéma
programme.desc: Lorsque Beck, photographe de voyage, décide de participer à un concours de photographie, il se rend sur l'île ensoleillée de Sérénité pour trouver de l'inspiration.

programme.title: De taudis à logis
programme.desc: Bienvenue à Orlando où le trio de rénovateurs est prêt à s'attaquer à une maison artisanale centenaire dans un quartier chic.

programme.title: Karine et la maison jaune
programme.desc: Karine visite une rembourreuse, gère un pépin dans la salle de bain et troque son style de chantier pour une robe de gala.

programme.title: Vendre ou rénover? USA
programme.desc: Maintenant que leurs garçons sont grands, Nina et Earl sont prêts à prendre une décision: rénover leur maison ou en chercher une meilleure.

programme.title: Couples à boutte
programme.desc: On parle de nos modèles familiaux; on se demande comment notre bagage façonne la personne que nous sommes.

programme.title: Relations toxiques
programme.desc: Elizabeth aide la famille Harris à dénoncer un chirurgien qui a manipulé leur fille, en la rendant dépendante à des médicaments.

programme.title: Mariage à l'aveugle
programme.desc: La lune de miel continue avec romance et amusement, mais un couple subit une grosse dispute après une révélation inattendue.

programme.title: SOS dermato
programme.desc: Une grosse bosse pousse sur l'oreille gauche de Miya après qu'un de ses perçages s'est infecté.

programme.title: Vendre ou rénover au Québec
programme.desc: Valérye et Dominic ont fait l'achat de leur première maison en 2011 à Blainville; ayant peu de moyens à l'époque, ils l'avaient choisie pour le plafond cathédrale, la cour intime et la proximité du train de banlieue.

programme.title: Vendre ou rénover au Québec
programme.desc: Sylvain a acheté une maison à Rosemère en 2007 et il y vit avec trois de ses quatre filles; il rencontre Maud qui a deux enfants et ils décident de recomposer leur famille chez lui.

programme.title: Vendre ou rénover au Québec
programme.desc: Maya et Nizar se sont rencontrés très jeunes au Liban et ils ont fait l'achat d'une maison unifamiliale à Saint-Bruno en 2015 pour eux et leurs trois enfants.

programme.title: Combien tu m'aimes?
programme.desc: Les couples font une cérémonie pour brûler un objet marquant de la vie des Mambo no 5; chaque duo commence à juger les autres et certains ont une opinion plus tranchante.

programme.title: Le grand chantier RONA
programme.desc: La quatrième semaine de la compétition s'annonce occupée pour les candidats qui ont à réaliser la chambre principale et la salle de lavage.

programme.title: Un souper presque parfait
programme.desc: Catherine raconte que son entourage est surpris de la voir participer, elle qui ne cuisine pourtant jamais; ses invités sont étonnés par son accueil chaleureux et la beauté de sa maison; elle instaure une règle: interdit de parler d'immobilier!

programme.title: Trois fois plus

programme.title: One Bad Apple: A Hannah Swensen Mystery
programme.desc: Hannah meets a new side of law and order as she investigates a murder.

programme.title: Storm Seekers
programme.desc: Scientists study the effects of global warming on hurricane frequency and strength.

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Inside his book, Harold can make anything come to life simply by drawing it. After he grows up and draws himself off the book's pages and into the real world, he learns his trusty crayon can set off more hilarious hijinks than he thought possible.

programme.title: Under the Christmas Tree
programme.desc: Romantic sparks fly between Alma and Charlie when Charlie finds the perfect tree for the Maine governor's holiday celebration right in Alma's backyard.

programme.title: Paws of Fury: The Legend of Hank
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck hound finds himself in a town full of cats who need a hero to defend them from a ruthless villain's evil plot. With help from a reluctant trainer, the underdog must assume the role of fearsome samurai and save the day.

programme.title: The Wish Swap
programme.desc: When Casey and Henry find themselves celebrating their birthdays at the same restaurant, they make birthday wishes at the same time which are granted. However they end up getting each other's wishes.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
programme.desc: A sudden attack by Wulf, a ruthless Dunlending lord, forces Helm Hammerhand and his people to make a daring last stand in the ancient stronghold of the Hornburg. Finding herself in a desperate situation, Helm's daughter must lead the resistance.

programme.title: A Haunting in Venice
programme.desc: Now retired and living in self-imposed exile in the world's most glamorous city, Poirot reluctantly attends a seance at a decaying, haunted palazzo. He soon gets thrust into a sinister world of shadows and secrets when one of the guests is murdered.

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: A classmate introduces teenage Owen to a mysterious late-night TV show -- a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. In the pale glow of the television, Owen's view of reality begins to crack.

programme.title: The Pitt
programme.desc: As patients continue to pour in, including a local prison inmate, Robby and Langdon must work together to save a beloved patient.

programme.title: Slotherhouse
programme.desc: Senior Emily Young wants to be elected sorority president. She adopts a cute sloth, thinking it will help her win, but a string of fatalities implicates the sloth.

programme.title: The Ugly Stepsister
programme.desc: Determined to outshine her beautiful stepsister, Elvira resorts to extreme measures to win the prince's heart.

programme.title: Someone Lives Here
programme.desc: Carpenter Khaleel Seivwright builds life-saving shelters for homeless people in Toronto.

programme.title: Jane Austen Wrecked My Life
programme.desc: Desperately single and plagued by writer's block, Agathe gets invited to the Jane Austen Writers' Residency in England. Caught in an unexpected romantic triangle, she must let go of her insecurities to decide what she really wants for herself.

programme.title: Storm Cell
programme.desc: A storm chaser battles personal demons while trying to save unsuspecting people from deadly weather.

programme.title: Corner Gas Animated
programme.desc: Brent discovers his parents put money aside for him, but Oscar's forgotten where it is; Karen and Davis are hurt to learn how often people lie to the police and enlist Wanda as their lie detector.

programme.title: Corner Gas Animated
programme.desc: Karen, Wanda, and Lacey struggle to get noticed on a dating app; Oscar, Emma, and Hank try to figure out who purchased the abandoned lot in town.

programme.title: Transplant
programme.desc: Bash does his best to celebrate Eid with his sister Amira, but she wishes they could continue the traditions they had back home; Theo treats a teenage patient who wants to avoid telling his parents why he's in the hospital.

programme.title: Earthstorm
programme.desc: Scientists turn to a demolition expert for help after learning the instability of the moon threatens all life on Earth.

programme.title: Fast Friends
programme.desc: Mother and daughter Yolanda and Ariana, couple Halani and Riordan and brothers Sam and Matt face off in all-new challenges; a guest tests

programme.title: A View to a Kill
programme.desc: British secret agent James Bond ties a mad tycoon and his statuesque aide to a plot to flood Silicon Valley.

programme.title: You Only Live Twice
programme.desc: Secret agent James Bond plays dead, then comes back as an Asian to save the world from SPECTRE's Blofeld.

programme.title: Termination Point
programme.desc: A government manhunt begins when a scientist boards a plane with the technology of a top-secret experiment in time travel.

programme.title: Malibu Shark Attack
programme.desc: An earthquake unleashes huge, prehistoric sharks that terrorize scenic California.

programme.title: The Teachers' Lounge
programme.desc: Teacher Carla Nowak decides to get involved when one of her students is suspected of theft. Caught between her ideals and the school system, the consequences of her actions threaten to break her.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydia's life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuice's name three times, the mischievous demon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: Saints and Warriors
programme.desc: The Skidegate Saints fight for the championship and their future as they compete in the 2024 All Native Basketball Tournament.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music that's always been inside him.

programme.title: Rye Lane
programme.desc: Two youngsters reeling from bad breakups connect over an eventful day in South London.

programme.title: The Shrouds
programme.desc: Karsh, a creative entrepreneur who lost his spouse, develops a machine designed to communicate with deceased individuals.

programme.title: Akilla's Escape
programme.desc: A drug dealer finds his moral code challenged when he interrupts an armed robbery and captures one of the gang members who is a 15-year-old boy.

programme.title: Corner Gas Animated
programme.desc: Brent and Karen go to war over the antiquated laws in Dog River; Hank and Emma track down Oscar's prize quarter.

programme.title: Corner Gas Animated
programme.desc: When Dog River is given a town bell, the citizens can't agree how it should be used; Oscar and Emma become coffee snobs and Brent investigates Wanda's strange spy-like behavior.

programme.title: Transplant
programme.desc: An incident at work causes Bash to second-guess himself; Mags is inspired by a firefighter devoted to her work, even if it means risking her life on a daily basis, and June must learn to work with others.

programme.title: Stop Making Sense
programme.desc: Filmmaker Jonathan Demme captures Talking Heads and an ecstatic ensemble of musicians at their exhilarating best in this iconic live performance.

programme.title: A Paris Christmas Waltz
programme.desc: Emma encounters a professional dancer Leo, whose enthusiasm for competitive dancing is diminishing. However, a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity presents itself for the novice to join the pro.

programme.title: Dr. No
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Sean Connery) foils a SPECTRE madman (Joseph Wiseman) out to divert rockets from Cape Canaveral.

programme.title: 'Twas the Text Before Christmas
programme.desc: A text message mistakenly sent to Addie leads to a friendship with the sender, a Christmas tradition with the woman's family, and a budding romance with her son.

programme.title: Rush for Your Life
programme.desc: Journalism student Tasha goes under cover as a sorority pledge to expose the people responsible for the death of a student the prior year. She quickly finds herself completing dangerous hazing rituals to secure a spot in the sorority.

programme.title: Zodiac: Signs of the Apocalypse
programme.desc: A 2,000-year-old astrology board possesses deadly powers that threaten the fate of humanity.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Moonraker
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Roger Moore) meets Hugo Drax (Michael Lonsdale), a tycoon out to nerve-gas Earth to make room for his space-bred master race.

programme.title: One Battle After Another
programme.desc: Bob is a washed-up revolutionary who lives in a state of paranoia, surviving off-grid with his daughter, Willa. When his nemesis resurfaces and Willa goes missing, the former radical scrambles to find her while battling the consequences of his past.

programme.title: The Mauritanian
programme.desc: A defense attorney, her associate and a military prosecutor uncover a far-reaching conspiracy while investigating the case of a suspected 9/11 terrorist imprisoned at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba, for six years.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: I Don't Know Who You Are
programme.desc: A working class Jamaican immigrant tries to get health care after being assaulted by a stranger.

programme.title: Corner Gas Animated
programme.desc: Karen and Davis try to uncover why Karen suddenly has violently angry feelings toward Hank; the citizens of Dog River are captivated by the Leroys' new swing; Brent, Wanda and Lacey butt heads over aromatherapy.

programme.title: Corner Gas Animated
programme.desc: Hank is upset when Wanda replaces him as Corn Maze designer at the the Dog River Corn Festival; Emma and Oscar compete with Davis to see who can complete their volunteer task first; Brent and Lacey raise money by selling popcorn.

programme.title: Transplant
programme.desc: Bash wants to make things right with Amira after their lives are turned upside down once again.

programme.title: Aurora Teagarden Mysteries: A Bone to Pick
programme.desc: Aurora Teagarden, librarian and proud member of the Real Murders Club, finds a human skull hidden in the window seat of her house.

programme.title: The Unbreakable Boy
programme.desc: When Scott and Teresa learn their son, Austin, is autistic and has brittle bone disease, they worry about his future. However, with Scott's growing faith and Austin's incredible spirit, they find joy, gratitude and courage in the most trying times.

programme.title: The Marksman
programme.desc: Jim is a former Marine who lives a solitary life as a rancher along the Arizona-Mexican border. But his peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when he tries to protect a boy on the run from members of a vicious cartel.

programme.title: Air Bud: Golden Receiver
programme.desc: A golden retriever with a flair for sports helps a boy (Kevin Zegers) handle football and the new boyfriend (Gregory Harrison) of the boy's widowed mother (Cynthia Stevenson).

programme.title: Behemoth
programme.desc: After an earthquake wakes a giant creature trapped in a mountain, residents have to find a way to kill it before it destroys the entire town.

programme.title: The Day the Earth Blew Up: A Looney Tunes Movie
programme.desc: Porky Pig and Daffy Duck become Earth's only hope when their antics at the local bubble-gum factory uncover a secret alien mind-control plot. Faced with cosmic odds, they must save their town and the world while not driving each other totally looney.

programme.title: A Christmas to Treasure
programme.desc: Sparks fly between former best friends Austin and Everett as they reunite for a holiday treasure hunt.

programme.title: Unsung Hero
programme.desc: David Smallbone moves his family to the United States to search for a brighter future. Struggling to make ends meet, he soon realizes the talents of his children, who go on to become two of the most successful acts in contemporary Christian music.

programme.title: Hockey Fanatics
programme.desc: Dave Foley and special guest Mike Myers go to Toronto to meet fans and discover the culinary scene of the city.

programme.title: Boston Strangler
programme.desc: Loretta McLaughlin becomes the first journalist to connect the Boston Strangler murders. As the mysterious killer claims more and more victims, Loretta attempts to continue her investigation alongside colleague and confidante Jean Cole.

programme.title: The Menu
programme.desc: Shocking surprises await a couple when they travel to a coastal island to sample a chef's lavish menu at an exclusive restaurant.

programme.title: The Office Movers
programme.desc: Out of options and in a desperate attempt to prove himself and his company's worth to his pro mover dad, Everett Saunders, owner of Shazam Moving, enlists the help of anyone he can find for the day's high stakes moving job.

programme.title: The Office Movers

programme.desc: Bash does his best to celebrate Eid with his sister Amira, but she wishes they could continue the traditions they had back home; Theo treats a teenage patient who wants to avoid telling his parents why he's in the hospital.

programme.title: Earthstorm
programme.desc: Scientists turn to a demolition expert for help after learning the instability of the moon threatens all life on Earth.

programme.title: Fast Friends

programme.title: A View to a Kill
programme.desc: British secret agent James Bond ties a mad tycoon and his statuesque aide to a plot to flood Silicon Valley.

programme.title: You Only Live Twice
programme.desc: Secret agent James Bond plays dead, then comes back as an Asian to save the world from SPECTRE's Blofeld.

programme.title: Termination Point
programme.desc: A government manhunt begins when a scientist boards a plane with the technology of a top-secret experiment in time travel.

programme.title: Malibu Shark Attack
programme.desc: An earthquake unleashes huge, prehistoric sharks that terrorize scenic California.

programme.title: The Teachers' Lounge
programme.desc: Teacher Carla Nowak decides to get involved when one of her students is suspected of theft. Caught between her ideals and the school system, the consequences of her actions threaten to break her.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydia's life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuice's name three times, the mischievous demon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: Saints and Warriors
programme.desc: The Skidegate Saints fight for the championship and their future as they compete in the 2024 All Native Basketball Tournament.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music that's always been inside him.

programme.title: Rye Lane
programme.desc: Two youngsters reeling from bad breakups connect over an eventful day in South London.

programme.title: The Shrouds
programme.desc: Karsh, a creative entrepreneur who lost his spouse, develops a machine designed to communicate with deceased individuals.

programme.title: The Shrouds
programme.desc: Karsh, a creative entrepreneur who lost his spouse, develops a machine designed to communicate with deceased individuals.

programme.title: Akilla's Escape
programme.desc: A drug dealer finds his moral code challenged when he interrupts an armed robbery and captures one of the gang members who is a 15-year-old boy.

programme.title: Corner Gas Animated
programme.desc: Brent and Karen go to war over the antiquated laws in Dog River; Hank and Emma track down Oscar's prize quarter.

programme.title: Corner Gas Animated

programme.title: Transplant
programme.desc: An incident at work causes Bash to second-guess himself; Mags is inspired by a firefighter devoted to her work, even if it means risking her life on a daily basis, and June must learn to work with others.

programme.title: Stop Making Sense
programme.desc: Filmmaker Jonathan Demme captures Talking Heads and an ecstatic ensemble of musicians at their exhilarating best in this iconic live performance.

programme.title: A Paris Christmas Waltz
programme.desc: Emma encounters a professional dancer Leo, whose enthusiasm for competitive dancing is diminishing. However, a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity presents itself for the novice to join the pro.

programme.title: Dr. No
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Sean Connery) foils a SPECTRE madman (Joseph Wiseman) out to divert rockets from Cape Canaveral.

programme.title: 'Twas the Text Before Christmas
programme.desc: A text message mistakenly sent to Addie leads to a friendship with the sender, a Christmas tradition with the woman's family, and a budding romance with her son.

programme.title: Rush for Your Life
programme.desc: Journalism student Tasha goes under cover as a sorority pledge to expose the people responsible for the death of a student the prior year. She quickly finds herself completing dangerous hazing rituals to secure a spot in the sorority.

programme.title: Zodiac: Signs of the Apocalypse
programme.desc: A 2,000-year-old astrology board possesses deadly powers that threaten the fate of humanity.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Moonraker
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Roger Moore) meets Hugo Drax (Michael Lonsdale), a tycoon out to nerve-gas Earth to make room for his space-bred master race.

programme.title: One Battle After Another
programme.desc: Bob is a washed-up revolutionary who lives in a state of paranoia, surviving off-grid with his daughter, Willa. When his nemesis resurfaces and Willa goes missing, the former radical scrambles to find her while battling the consequences of his past.

programme.title: The Mauritanian
programme.desc: A defense attorney, her associate and a military prosecutor uncover a far-reaching conspiracy while investigating the case of a suspected 9/11 terrorist imprisoned at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba, for six years.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: I Don't Know Who You Are
programme.desc: A working class Jamaican immigrant tries to get health care after being assaulted by a stranger.

programme.title: Corner Gas Animated

programme.title: Transplant
programme.desc: Bash wants to make things right with Amira after their lives are turned upside down once again.

programme.title: Aurora Teagarden Mysteries: A Bone to Pick
programme.desc: Aurora Teagarden, librarian and proud member of the Real Murders Club, finds a human skull hidden in the window seat of her house.

programme.title: The Unbreakable Boy
programme.desc: When Scott and Teresa learn their son, Austin, is autistic and has brittle bone disease, they worry about his future. However, with Scott's growing faith and Austin's incredible spirit, they find joy, gratitude and courage in the most trying times.

programme.title: The Marksman
programme.desc: Jim is a former Marine who lives a solitary life as a rancher along the Arizona-Mexican border. But his peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when he tries to protect a boy on the run from members of a vicious cartel.

programme.title: Air Bud: Golden Receiver
programme.desc: A golden retriever with a flair for sports helps a boy (Kevin Zegers) handle football and the new boyfriend (Gregory Harrison) of the boy's widowed mother (Cynthia Stevenson).

programme.title: Behemoth
programme.desc: After an earthquake wakes a giant creature trapped in a mountain, residents have to find a way to kill it before it destroys the entire town.

programme.title: The Day the Earth Blew Up: A Looney Tunes Movie
programme.desc: Porky Pig and Daffy Duck become Earth's only hope when their antics at the local bubble-gum factory uncover a secret alien mind-control plot. Faced with cosmic odds, they must save their town and the world while not driving each other totally looney.

programme.title: A Christmas to Treasure
programme.desc: Sparks fly between former best friends Austin and Everett as they reunite for a holiday treasure hunt.

programme.title: Unsung Hero
programme.desc: David Smallbone moves his family to the United States to search for a brighter future. Struggling to make ends meet, he soon realizes the talents of his children, who go on to become two of the most successful acts in contemporary Christian music.

programme.title: Hockey Fanatics
programme.desc: Dave Foley and special guest Mike Myers go to Toronto to meet fans and discover the culinary scene of the city.

programme.title: Boston Strangler
programme.desc: Loretta McLaughlin becomes the first journalist to connect the Boston Strangler murders. As the mysterious killer claims more and more victims, Loretta attempts to continue her investigation alongside colleague and confidante Jean Cole.

programme.title: The Menu
programme.desc: Shocking surprises await a couple when they travel to a coastal island to sample a chef's lavish menu at an exclusive restaurant.

programme.title: The Office Movers
programme.desc: Out of options and in a desperate attempt to prove himself and his company's worth to his pro mover dad, Everett Saunders, owner of Shazam Moving, enlists the help of anyone he can find for the day's high stakes moving job.

programme.title: The Office Movers
programme.desc: Everett attempts to train up a fresh crop of Shazam movers and reconnects with an old friend who introduces the possibility of a big pay-out in his future.

programme.title: The Queen of My Dreams
programme.desc: Pakistani Muslim Mariam and her Canadian-born daughter Azra come of age in two different eras against the backdrop of a shared obsession with Bollywood fantasy.

programme.title: Sesame Street Presents: Follow That Bird
programme.desc: Big Bird, whisked away to Illinois by a misguided social worker, sets out to rejoin his friends in New York.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry's Giant Adventure
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry encounter a grumpy giant after climbing a beanstalk to a magical land.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A misfit Viking teenager sees a chance to change the course of his clan's future when he befriends an injured dragon.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
programme.desc: When Hiccup and Toothless discover a cave that's home to hundreds of wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
programme.desc: When the sudden appearance of a female Light Fury coincides with the darkest threat their village has ever faced, Hiccup and Toothless must journey to a hidden world to finally discover their true destinies as dragon and rider.

programme.title: Switching Goals
programme.desc: Soccer-playing twins (Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen) decide to help their father (Eric Lutes), a coach seeking a seventh championship title.

programme.title: Air Bud: Golden Receiver
programme.desc: A golden retriever with a flair for sports helps a boy (Kevin Zegers) handle football and the new boyfriend (Gregory Harrison) of the boy's widowed mother (Cynthia Stevenson).

programme.title: Rudy
programme.desc: With heart and determination an Illinois youth (Sean Astin) tackles shortcomings to play Notre Dame football.

programme.title: We Are Marshall
programme.desc: Jack Lengyel, the new coach at West Virginia's Marshall University, vows to rebuild the school's football program after a plane crash claims the lives of 75 players, staff and fans.

programme.title: Spartacus: House of Ashur
programme.desc: Achillia returns to the arena to face her greatest challenge, while Ashur wrestles with the emotional fallout of his actions.

programme.title: The BMF Documentary: Blowing Money Fast
programme.desc: In Atlanta, Meech wants to expand by launching BMF Entertainment and stepping into the music industry; a deadly shooting at Atlanta's hottest nightclub puts BMF in the spotlight, bringing unwanted attention and causing a rift between the brothers.

programme.title: Finding Kendrick Johnson
programme.desc: Filmmaker Jason Pollock investigates the controversy surrounding the mysterious death of Kendrick Johnson, a Black teenager whose body was discovered inside a high school gymnasium in Valdosta, Ga.

programme.title: Cinéma
programme.desc: A peculiar neighbor (Suzanne Clément) offers hope to a recent widow (Anne Dorval) who is struggling to raise a teenager (Antoine-Olivier Pilon) who is unpredictable and, sometimes, violent.

programme.title: Easter Sunday
programme.desc: A man returns home to celebrate Easter with his riotous, bickering, eating, drinking, laughing, loving family.

programme.title: Gabrielle
programme.desc: A young woman who has Williams syndrome possesses amazing musical talents but struggles continually to gain her independence.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Dr. Magnus and the Sanctuary team attempt to capture a rare and deadly creature while under the watchful eye of a local news crew.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: When abnormals begin assaulting humans, the Sanctuary team suspects an airborne virus or biological agent to be the cause.

programme.title: Ozzy
programme.desc: A lovable dog must rely on some new friends to help it break out of canine prison and get back home to his owners.

programme.title: Maudie
programme.desc: From childhood to her deathbed, a woman experiences love, loss and discrimination.

programme.title: Kayak to Klemtu
programme.desc: A 14-year-old girl readies for a kayak trip along the shores of the Great Bear rainforest with her family to protest oil tanker traffic.

programme.title: Breakaway
programme.desc: A young man is torn between his traditional Indo-Canadian family expectations and his dreams of playing hockey.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: The Green Lanterns have little regard for humans, who have been unable to harness the powers of the ring each member wears. But Jordan, a test pilot, may be the corps' only hope when an enemy called Parallax threatens the universal balance of power.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: While Lex Luthor plots against him, the Man of Steel tries to reconnect with Lois Lane and find his place in a world that learned to survive in his absence.

programme.title: Akeelah and the Bee
programme.desc: Akeelah, an 11-year-old girl living in South Los Angeles, discovers she has a talent for spelling, which she hopes will take her to the National Spelling Bee.

programme.title: Lean on Me
programme.desc: Principal Joe Clark (Morgan Freeman) goes to bat against drugs, crime and bad grades in his Paterson, N.J., high school.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Christine's secret identity is compromised following the death of one of her clients; she sees two new clients, a married couple.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Christine's growing intimacy with a new client threatens to cross business boundaries; the law firm appoints David as managing partner.

programme.title: Minx
programme.desc: While David and Tina deal with Bottom Dollar's financial woes, Joyce helps a coverboy prepare for Minx's first presser.

programme.title: Minx
programme.desc: When Doug forces her to make nice with the mob, Joyce finds herself surrounded by the gangsters' wives, who offer her some sage advice; the team struggles to capture their missing leader's artistic vision for their renaissance-man model.

programme.title: Crisis
programme.desc: A drug trafficker organizes a smuggling operation while a recovering addict seeks the truth behind her son's disappearance.

programme.title: Rhymes for Young Ghouls
programme.desc: In 1976, a Mi'gMaq teenager plots revenge against the sadistic Indian agent who imprisoned her in a residential school where rape and abuse are common.

programme.title: Real Time
programme.desc: A killer gives a gambler an hour to live.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: The Five, led by Magnus, attempt to find the secret labyrinth in the decimated city of Bhalasaam; once located, they must complete a series of cryptic tests that can only be achieved using each of their unique powers.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: The search for Ashley puts Magnus, Will, Druitt and Tesla in the path of Kate Freelander, a con artist with ties to the Cabal who divulges the location of a secret facility.

programme.title: Cooking With Stella
programme.desc: A woman cooks for clients and tries to keep her thefts of food and money from being discovered.

programme.title: Clara
programme.desc: In a race to find intelligent life in the universe, an astronomer and his freethinking research assistant make an inexplicable discovery that changes how they see the world -- and each other.

programme.title: Air Bud: Spikes Back
programme.desc: A dog that plays volleyball helps investigators solve a rash of mysterious crimes.

programme.title: Dolphin Tale
programme.desc: A marine biologist (Harry Connick Jr.), a prosthetics designer (Morgan Freeman) and a boy band together to save the life of a dolphin whose tail was severely damaged in a trap.

programme.title: Where the Wild Things Are
programme.desc: Sent to bed without supper, a mischievous boy enters a land that grows out of his imagination and becomes king of the fantastic creatures who live there.

programme.title: Best in Show
programme.desc: Pampered pooches and their quirky owners converge on Philadelphia to compete in a prestigious dog show.

programme.title: A Mighty Wind
programme.desc: In order to honor his late father, a man (Bob Balaban) reunites various musicians (Christopher Guest, John Michael Higgins) to perform folk music at a tribute concert.

programme.title: Beetlejuice
programme.desc: A couple returns from the dead to find that they are back in their beloved home, as ghosts. They are horrified when the house is sold to a pretentious couple.

programme.title: Love & Basketball
programme.desc: From childhood to early adulthood, two friends (Sanaa Lathan, Omar Epps) fall in love while trying to establish basketball careers.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Christine attempts to prevent any further intrusions from Jack, but encounters another problem from an unexpected source.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Christine goes on the attack at Kirkland, intent on achieving revenge; David receives an email potentially exposing Christine as an escort.

programme.title: Minx
programme.desc: The Bottom Dollar crew takes to the streets to build brand awareness, but while Richie, Bambi and Shelly's word-of-mouth campaigns see some success, Joyce creates chaos on campus in her attempts to woo a celebrity guest.

programme.title: Minx
programme.desc: While Doug celebrates Minx's success, Joyce laments her new celebrity status; Councilwoman Westbury doubles down on her efforts to bring down Bottom Dollar, and Richie enters the L.A. art scene.

programme.title: Maps to the Stars
programme.desc: Driven by an intense need for fame and validation, members of a dysfunctional Hollywood dynasty have lives as dramatic as any movie.

programme.title: Laurence Anyways
programme.desc: In the '90s, Laurence tells his girlfriend, Fred, that he wants to become a woman; they confront the prejudices of their friends, ignore the council of their families and brave the phobias of the society they offend.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Magnus demands information from Kate; Tesla and Henry try to create a weapon that can stop attacks on Sanctuaries without killing Ashley.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Dr. Magnus and Druitt struggle to come to terms with the apparent death of their daughter; Will, Henry and Bigfoot must organize and process hundreds of surviving Abnormals.

programme.title: Air Bud
programme.desc: Abandoned by a disagreeable clown (Michael Jeter), a golden retriever with a knack for basketball befriends a lonely boy (Kevin Zegers).

programme.title: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: An eager beagle joins undercover canines on a mission to foil a feline plot to make all people allergic to dogs.

programme.title: Cats and Dogs 2: The Revenge of Kitty Galore
programme.desc: Felines and canines form an unprecedented alliance to protect themselves and their humans from a rogue cat who wants to turn the world into her personal scratching post.

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: A woman who has miraculously remained young for nearly 80 years meets a charismatic philanthropist who reawakens her passion for life and romance.

programme.title: Blizzard
programme.desc: A youngster learns about true friendship with the help of a magically gifted reindeer from the North Pole.

programme.title: Eve & the Fire Horse
programme.desc: A 9-year-old Chinese girl (Phoebe Jojo Kut) and her older sister (Hollie Lo) embrace their experiences at a Roman Catholic Sunday school.

programme.title: Song of the Sea
programme.desc: An Irish youth discovers that his mute sister is a selkie who must find her voice and free supernatural creatures from the spell of a Celtic goddess.

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: A struggling hairdresser finds a renewed sense of purpose when she meets a widowed father and his two daughters. With his youngest critically ill and waiting for a liver transplant, the fierce woman rallies an entire community to help.

programme.title: Moonlight
programme.desc: A look at three defining chapters in the life of Chiron, a young black man growing up in Miami. His epic journey to manhood is guided by the kindness, support and love of the community that helps raise him.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Christine's different worlds of school and work collide, which forces her to devise a way to come out on top.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Christine embraces her career as a GFE provider following her humiliating experience at the law firm.

programme.title: Minx
programme.desc: Joyce enjoys the spotlight as a guest on an iconic TV talk show while fighting against memories of her time in N.Y.; Doug makes moves for Minx; back home, Bambi and Richie discover Tina's secret.

programme.title: Minx
programme.desc: While Joyce enjoys all that New York has to offer, Doug discovers that running the magazine without her proves difficult; after Joyce's embarrassing on-air announcement, Shelly turns to Bambi for help getting her marriage back on track.

programme.title: Matthias & Maxime
programme.desc: Two young men's lifelong friendship is tested when they act in a movie whose script calls for them to kiss each other.

programme.title: Edge of Winter
programme.desc: Stranded at a remote cabin in the wintertime, two siblings (Tom Holland, Percy Hynes White) must fight for survival as their increasingly unhinged father (Joel Kinnaman) loses his grip on reality.

programme.title: Fubar 2
programme.desc: Head bangers Terry (David Lawrence) and Dean (Paul J. Spence) are tired of barely scraping by and jump on an opportunity to go north and work on the pipelines during the holidays.

programme.title: Gem & Shaz
programme.desc: Two Asian Canadian teenage girls are given one hour at the school dance by their strict immigrant parents and are determined to make the most of it.
